title: RapScript
description: RapScript is a word-machine for freestyle-rappers.You are running out of ideas when freestyle-rapping? Your topics are always the same? You are searching for new challenges to push your skills to the next level?No problem!RapScript will throw crazy words at you in the timing of your choice. Use them in your parts and create insane stories. Or expose Fake-MC´s and their pre-written lines. Time is your merciless enemy.An if it becomes too easy:• 3 Skill-Levels• 4 Languages• 10 Speed-LevelsSo step on the mic an show what you´ve got!
descriptionHTML:
RapScript is a word-machine for freestyle-rappers.

You are running out of ideas when freestyle-rapping? Your topics are always the same? You are searching for new challenges to push your skills to the next level?

No problem!
RapScript will throw crazy words at you in the timing of your choice. Use them in your parts and create insane stories. Or expose Fake-MC´s and their pre-written lines. Time is your merciless enemy.

An if it becomes too easy:

• 3 Skill-Levels
• 4 Languages
• 10 Speed-Levels

So step on the mic an show what you´ve got!
comments: Could be way better... I know the website which is pretty good, but the app always says that I don't have an working Internet connection even if I do... please fix :)    Update: Got fixed, I can use it now. But I thought the app gives a beat as well, not only words, just like the internet site. Also, I don't know why I need Internet to use this app then, because actually it only gives words, where is the need of Internet?
Fix Problem Ok so the app is good,  but now it wont connect to the internet when i clearly have a full wifi signal... Come on i will bump it to 5 stars when fixed

Definitely a great idea for an app. Creates a good way to exercise the mind and execution. Although, it would be so much more better if not for the "network disruption" or if it just didn't have to run on network service at all.
Its ok but some words don't rhyme and I mostly like doing things that rhyme
The website works better than the app. Says my network is down but yet I'm able to write this comment so I have a connection. PleAse fix.
Fix it I would like it if it worked. It says it's not connecting to the Internet
recentChanges: • Fixed a bug with Google Cast
